description: VESPL Presents Silver And Golden Color Plated Floral Shaped Brass Bowl And Tray Set Of 5 Pcs. The Set of Silver and Golden Color Plated Brass Metal Floral shaped 2 bowls, 2 Spoons and a Tray comes with Elegant Red Velvet Box, This can be utilized for Dinning & Serving and impress your guests. Or you can use this for gifting purpose.
